channel.title: What program do i need to run "Batch files"
channel.description:
Hey guys,
When i try to run any batch files, i get a black box flash up got like 2 seconds. What program does my computer need to be able to run my server source which is a .batch file. and where to download it.
thanks.

item.title: What program do i need to run "Batch files"
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.source: What program do i need to run "Batch files"

item.title: What program do i need to run "Batch files"
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Run the source and log in with the IP 127.0.0.1 on the MoparScape client.

Read full topic
item.source: What program do i need to run "Batch files"

item.title: What program do i need to run "Batch files"
item.dc:creator: @MobilScape MobilScape
item.description:
@MobilScape wrote:

Im only a REAL beginner and i dont care about the GRAphics and animations at the moment. I am only playing around with the source and client to see how everything works and get a basic server up and running on my own.

So, what do i need to do… to run the SOURCE on the moperscape client. I dont care about the GRaphics. Just wanting to know how to do it. Because when i launch the Moperscape client it automatically uses the hybridscape server. How do i use the DELTA source on it.

??
Thanks.

Read full topic
item.source: What program do i need to run "Batch files"

item.title: What program do i need to run "Batch files"
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Download Bluur’s client or delta’s original one for delta; mopar’s client will reduce the server’s customs, gfx, animations ect. to the max

Read full topic
item.source: What program do i need to run "Batch files"

item.title: What program do i need to run "Batch files"
item.dc:creator: @MobilScape MobilScape
item.description:
@MobilScape wrote:

YAY! Thanks guys for your help. The issue is all fixed. Now, How do i run the source on the Moperscape client,.

The source is DELTASCAPE. And the client is Moperscape.

How do i run them on eachother. Just for private viewing. Not online.

Read full topic

PATH
information here

so for classpath

do i set it to

CLASSPATH(x86)
information here.

item.title: What program do i need to run "Batch files"
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

64bit? then on your class paths use Program Files(x86)instead of Program Files

item.title: What program do i need to run "Batch files"
item.dc:creator: @MobilScape MobilScape
item.description:
@MobilScape wrote:

i did that… now it says

"java’ is not recognised as an internal or external command to run a batch file.
Press any key to continue.

I think i have set the path because i have been able to run the Moperscape client .jar file. Or do i need to set somthing else eg classpath or something.

What might be the problem.

Read full topic

The problem is the batch file, right click edit, add a the word pause on a new line under everything else, than post what happens when you run it again.
